**Gold Elixir Great Elixir Poem**

Title: *Gold Elixir Great Elixir Poem*
One scroll.
Author unknown, likely from the Tang Dynasty.
Source: *Zhengtong Daozang*, Taixuan Section.

---

**Gold Elixir Great Elixir Poem**

One substance born of Heaven-Earth,
Two polarities nurture the medicinal root—
Yin-essence merges with Earth’s spirit,
Yang-qi emanates from Heaven’s soul.

Transformed as a tiger, it treads the Golden Path,
As a dragon, it hides within the Wooden Gate.
Solar essence refines the lunar shadow,
Counted steps secure it at Kunlun’s peak.

True Water submits to True Fire,
Fire’s perfection forges noble gold,
Gold’s perfection fells the Wood and transforms,
Returning to Earth, it earns reverence.

Sun and Moon refine yin and yang,
Wind and Clouds ensnare Dragon and Tiger.
Three cycles, four and five complete,
Transcending the world’s rise and fall.

Creation long submerged in flux,
Must cast off life’s decayed husk—
Red lead weighs heavy in Heaven’s realm,
White mercury stands apart in Dao’s gate.

Inheriting qi, the divine Dragon-Tiger,
Formed, the Dao’s husband and wife.
Yin-yang’s True Water and Fire,
Refined, they ascend to the Celestial Capital.

Nine transformations govern the three essences,
True-hearted refinement is no hardship—
The Tiger’s birth yields fierce divine water,
The Dragon’s change produces saintly gold.

Gold and Wood’s affinity unites the body,
Heaven-Earth forge the Great Elixir.
The Five Phases’ essence enters the abdomen,
Ascending the Nine-Heaven Altar.

Men know lead’s thousand-day alchemy,
True mercury binds itself—
Three autumns’ cultivation complete,
Boiled, it becomes the Tiger’s peak.

Dragon’s might subdues the Tiger’s crouch,
The Tiger’s ferocity tames the Dragon’s repose—
Life’s transformation opens the Victorious Gate,
Divine Elixir emerges in Mysterious Play.

One substance harmonizes with Heaven’s span,
Nine returns, seven illuminations—
Chase lead, yet it eludes,
Pursue mercury, it vanishes aloft.

Transformed as Tiger, it submerges in the Spring,
As Dragon, it hides in Fire’s treasure.
Divine clarity penetrates the Great Dao,
Refined, it crowns the King of Medicines.

Recognizing Wood’s vital essence,
Worthy of planting on the pool’s brink—
Balanced, it divides the Fire’s flame,
Harvesting noble gold’s bloom.

The Tiger’s fierce light is gathered,
The Dragon’s lightning flashes—
At once, the Saintly Dao is realized,
A thousand days refine the morning’s glow.

Discussing lead yet not knowing lead,
How can one grasp the profound principle?
The Green Dragon does not rise and fall,
The White Tiger hides in repose.

Darkly merging with True Qi,
Clearly sensing the High Immortal—
Cultivation’s power is vast,
Completion reveals Heaven’s intent.

The *Ren-Gui* Great Elixir Pool,
*Bing-Ding* as the True Medicine’s foundation,
*Geng-Xin* births the Tiger’s might,
*Jia-Yi* radiates the Dragon’s awe.

Sun and Moon enhance their splendor,
Yin and Yang exchange their robes—
Immortal transmission of Fire’s timing,
*Wu-Ji* wears the flying man’s crown.

Reflecting the Inner Five Phases,
Contracting Earth, harmonizing with Heaven,
Transforming the Tiger into a Golden Body,
Giving birth to the Dragon in Wooden Form.

Three Flowers refine by nodes,
One substance wraps the boundary script—
After seven returns and nine transformations,
Transcending the mundane, entering the Saintly Spirit.

Clarifying the Great Elixir’s core,
Seek within the mercury’s depths—
The Eastern Dragon meets its fate,
The Western Tiger pays homage.

Affinity and nature blend in harmony,
Containing breath, profound and deep—
Refined, it becomes the True One Qi,
Transcending the world, free from rise and fall.

The Great Dao is nameless in origin,
The Soul Elixir reveals its operation—
Heaven-Earth open the Sacred Thing,
Dragon and Tiger birth the Divine.

Water and Fire’s True Primordial Qi,
Yin and Yang refine the Solar Essence—
The Moon’s thirty-six revolutions,
Resplendent, granting eternal life.

One is True Water,
Three open the Immortal Path—
Four bloom the Flower of Days,
Two refine the Spirit-Soul.

Five hues manifest the Yang Qi,
Nine returns, the Elixir ascends from dust—
Circulating the Twelve Seasons’ script,
Life’s transformation lifts the body aloft.

Lead and Mercury’s Great Elixir Lord,
True Persons unite as one—
Heaven-Earth nurture the numinous Qi,
Dragon and Tiger split the Primordial Purity.

Five hues shine with clarity,
Three essences’ natures divide—
After nine transformations’ refinement,
The dwelling is abandoned, ascending to Azure Clouds.

The enlightened observe further,
Returning Elixirs in five forms—
Immortal hands personally refine,
Mortals transmit with devoted hearts.

Seeking the Tiger from a master’s guidance,
Knowing the Dragon through Dao’s scrutiny—
Three winters, the Martial and Civil turn,
Light illuminates the Nine-Heaven’s chill.

Divine Water irrigates the Flower Pool,
Knowing the interplay of presence and absence—
Green Dragon merges with the Tiger’s body,
White Tiger absorbs the Dragon’s fat.

Two substances communicate the Sacred,
Three essences blend in resplendent ritual—
A thousand days refine the Flower,
Completed, it honors Heaven’s timing.

Entering the Dao, one must know its non-duality,
With a pure heart, discerning the subtle—
Name and form granted in the Immortal Realm,
Lead and Mercury return to the Sacred.

Dragon and Tiger’s Returning Elixir’s root,
Husband and wife symbolize the medicinal foundation—
Yin and Yang’s division holds the secret key,
Few awaken to its profound truth.

A substance that ensnares the mind,
Immortal sages explore its depths—
The Fire Dragon sheds its Water shell,
The Water Tiger erects its Golden Spleen.

Transformed as Tiger, it becomes the True Groom,
Summoning the Dragon, it establishes the Saintly Bride—
Their union births the Great Dao,
Inviting them to the Nine-Function Chamber.

The Dao opens, aligning Heaven and Earth,
No mortal can glimpse the Immortal Path—
Lead and Mercury clearly reveal the truth,
The Cloud-Carriage’s path is unerring.

The Abyss defines South and North,
Thunder and Dipper align East and West—
Four Symbols ignite Dragon and Tiger,
Extraordinary function, resolve unyielding.

Scriptures and precepts discuss unity,
Yin and Yang rise from the North to South—
The Boy’s years: four, five, six,
The Girl’s years: twelve, thirteen.

Sun and Moon’s union in twilight’s embrace,
Husband and wife’s beauty grows ever more coveted—
Elixir’s transformation follows the Fire’s Dao,
Nine transformations—no idle talk.

The Soul Elixir reveals the hidden Dao,
One Qi circulates in the flames—
Responding to the Sun and Moon’s union,
Transforming Tiger and Dragon, salty and pungent.

Immortal sages play with Gold and Wood,
Morning and evening, they toy with the Black Hare—
Awakening to the principle of eternal life,
Through lead, they reject the old guest’s invitation.

Lead and Mercury cycle through spring and autumn,
Heaven-Earth’s midst is good for cultivation—
Completion yields the world-transcending medicine,
After ingestion, one attains Heaven’s roaming.

Yang-refinement gathers the born Soul,
Yin-dissolution scatters the dispersed Spirit—
Dragging the Dragon, devouring the Tiger,
Two substances flow in Sacred Communion.

The Dao is sought before one’s eyes,
Golden sprouts are not grasped in search—
The Golden Mountain opens the Tiger’s Valley,
Wooden Water washes the Dragon’s jaws.

Yang-qi, the Dragon’s breath, exhales,
Yin-wind, the Tiger’s inhalation—
Divine Flame burns the Sacred Water,
The Elixir ascends, soaring the Nine-Heavens.

Green Dragon and White Tiger study,
Lead and Mercury unite as kin—
Male and female share affinity,
Husband and wife radiate in crimson clouds.

Yin and Yang’s singular substance,
Morning and evening, fierce in the Three Flowers—
After eighteen Heavenly Stems,
The Cloud-Piercing Path is unerring.

「The Dao/Way enfolds the hidden elixir within the Yin-Yang embrace,
Immortal messengers descend to open and transcribe.
The Great Dao/Way’s divine communion is complete—
The Returned Elixir’s sacred essence is never cast aside.

Dragon’s *emotion/qing* is inscribed on the left bank,
Tiger’s *nature/xing* is recorded on the right—
Beneath the banner, the Primordial Lord rejoices,
At the Mystic Gate, feathered disciples knock.

One substance irrigates the Three *Jins* (refinements),
The Five Phases are mastered through profound inquiry—
Westward gather the Tiger’s roaring halt,
Eastward seize the Dragon’s resonant stillness.

In the Sacred Land, the Elixir’s form is perfected,
Only Heaven’s alignment harmonizes with the Dao/Way-heart—
Refining Yang through three *jius* (ninefold cycles),
Divine beings sigh in reverence and awe.

The Sun-Moon Elixir’s essence is most refined,
Gods and Immortals display their utmost sacredness—
When Yin-Yang’s union is complete,
Dragon and Tiger spontaneously merge and coalesce.

Water and Fire harmonize the *Zhenqi* (True Qi),
Morning and evening embody the refined form—
Three cycles of cold and heat’s power,
Sweet and exquisite flavor, its fragrance alone.

How does one advance in Dao/Way’s path?—no surety,
Clutching the heart like ice, yet firm—
Yellow Lead summons response and resonance,
Black Mercury reveals the essence’s condensation.

Two substances generate radiant brilliance,
The Three Flowers bloom with vibrant hues—
When Yin-essence fades, it vanishes utterly,
Yang-power ascends, riding the clouds.

Black Water purifies the profound depths,
White Lead attains its hidden essence—
Westward *Jin* (Metal) subdues Eastward Wood,
Eastward Wood originates from Westward *Jin*.

At their appointed meeting, hands cannot be parted,
In perfect harmony, hearts contract—
After three autumns of cultivation,
A thousand days refine the light and shade.

All things shed their mortal forms,
The Three Talents (Heaven, Earth, Man) are most spiritually sublime—
Know the Lead’s refinement and Mercury’s secret,
Clarify the Dao/Way to harmonize with Heaven’s script.

Refining the Tiger’s Elixir-power,
Capturing the Dragon’s essence to brew—
Once cold and heat are exhausted,
The True Self enters the Immortal Pavilion.

Lead and Mercury’s fame spreads far,
Yet few perceive their hidden Dao/Way—
Obscure and distant, harboring Water and Earth,
Dazzling and illuminating, casting light east and west.

*Qingxing* (emotion-nature) and divine light unite,
Yin-Yang’s sacred power converges—
Twenty-seven adjustments perfected,
One’s name is already inscribed in the Immortal Register.

Though Lead and Mercury are oft-heard of,
Few grasp their profound mysteries—
Red Lead emerges from Black Elixir,
White Mercury enters, light as Yellow.

Dragon and Tiger generate Golden Marrow,
Room (chamber) and Parameter (bedchamber) refine Wooden Essence—
A thousand days nurture the Three Flowers,
Nine Heavens welcome within the belly.

True Mercury rests with the Immortals,
True Lead grounds the Sacred Elixir—
In past births, one neared them briefly,
Now the Dao/Way’s mystery is unveiled.

Three years, the Divine Elixir shines,
Nine returns radiate luminous hues—
Later practitioners of the Dao/Way,
Seek the *Zihe* (Purple River) Robe.

The Dao/Way alone encompasses Heaven-Earth,
Bukan and *Kun* (Heaven-Earth) yield the Elixir’s peak—
The Five Phases all respond and transform,
The Four Symbols (trigrams) flow through every scripture.

Divine Water is the Primordial Sovereign,
True *Jin* (Metal) enters Wood’s refinement—
Who knows the Sacred Fire’s truth?
It transmutes Earth, ascending Nine Heavens.

Wood bears treasures fit for use,
Water enfolds True *Jin*—
Within the Five Phases’ essence is secured,
These Three *Bans* (substances) are profound.

Refining Yin-Yang’s Sacred Qi,
Nurturing the Tiger to earn the Dragon’s reverence—
A thousand days of fire’s culmination,
The Elixir’s light shines upon the Divine.

The Great Elixir returns as Returned Elixir,
A single grain ascends, piercing Heaven—
The Dragon’s might subdues the Tiger’s power,
The Tiger’s ferocity captures the Dragon’s breath.

Two years of shared gestation,
Three *Bans* (substances) distilled into one—
Ten months of divine penetration,
Earth is formed, seated upon the Golden Furnace.

True Water and Earth must be known—
*Kun*’s Primordial Victory is the Earthly Root,
*Zhen*’s hidden essence is the Sacred Wood,
*Li*’s borrowed fire is the *Jin*’s form.

The Five Phases must be discerned,
A thousand days refine the Spirit—
Essence is gathered, exhausting the Eight Trigrams,
Dragon and Tiger enfold treasures within.

Alas, the floating world is fleeting,
Hard to abandon the Gate of Life and Death—
Swiftly cultivate the Sacred Elixir,
Only then can one rival Heaven-Earth.

Divine Water decocts the Dragon’s *po* (spirit),
Sacred Flame refines the Tiger’s *hun* (soul)—
After three years of labor,
A single grain faces Heaven’s glory.

Still contemplation transforms sinking and floating,
Clarity of the Dao/Way knows no betrayal—
Divine beings should awaken to its truth,
Life and Death sway like withering and flourishing.

The Great Dao/Way’s root is transformation,
Cultivating the body to revive one’s fate—
The Five Phases’ true secrets are revealed,
Like a crown, pouring nectar as recompense.

Yellow Lead triumphs in entering the Mystic,
Black Mercury surges from the Spirit’s spring—
Two Qi meet and merge,
The Three Flowers are secretly wrapped and decocted.

East and West follow the Sun-Moon’s rhythm,
South and North move with the passing years—
After three years of labor,
Luminous light ranks the Immortals.

Formless, one hears the Great Dao/Way,
With Elixir, the Mystic is concealed—
True Water returns to True Fire,
Red Lead replaces Black Lead.

The Five Phases gather Qi fully,
The Four Symbols reverse the winds’ rotation—
Fire circulates through Yin-Yang’s embrace,
The Sacred Elixir gleams in the Azure Sky.

When *Bukan* and *Kun* harmonize in *Tai* (peace),
Sun-Moon nurture the *Hua* (Flower) Pool—
Green Wood’s Three Flowers are hidden,
White *Jin*’s Seven Maidens know.

Husband and Wife align as *Jin* and Wood,
Each birthing Tiger and Dragon offspring—
Nine turns and three cycles complete,
The Spirit’s communion leaves no doubt.

*Duì*’s (Lake) brilliance conceals the Golden Tiger,
*Zhen*’s (Thunder) rumble harbors the Wooden Dragon—
Rain and wind meet at their appointed hour,
*Qingxing* (emotion-nature) merges in warmth and reverence.

Water and Earth nourish the root and stem,
Yin-Yang sears the fundamental essence—
Past verdant clarity reveals profound logic,
Not shared with the common worldly folk.

True Lead dwells in the distant void,
Faintly visible, its form concealed—
First, South and North unite,
Then East and West merge together.

Three years of Fire’s power in motion,
Nine turns yield the Elixir’s fragrance—
Cold and heat, Yin and Yang prevail,
Heaven-Earth produce the Elixir’s sacredness.»

「The Great Dao is hard to discern,
Who knows the Five Phases within?
Buan (Heaven-Earth) holds the balance in its core,
The Soul and Spirit (*húnpò*) shine bright in the heart’s realm.

Earth’s Spirit (*dìpò*) reveals the True Principle,
Heaven’s Soul (*tiān hún*) unveils the Sacred Essence—
If one grasps this mystery,
Their name shall hang in the Nine Heavens’ glory.

Water and Earth nurture the Yellow Sprout,
Fire and Metal forge the White Flower—
The Eastern neighbor’s fair daughter takes delight,
The Western neighbor’s fine son boasts of his prowess.

Three years of harmonious union,
Yin-Yang as mediators between two homes,
The *Gēng Xīn* (Metal-Water) Chamber seals the refining,
A thousand days transform it into the dawn’s radiance.

Water and Fire form flesh and bone,
Wood and Metal cultivate the Elixir’s root—
True Lead (*huángqiān*) yields White Trust (*bái xìn*),
White Mercury (*bái gōng*) repays the Moon’s favor.

The Four Symbols (*sìxiàng*) cycle in fixed order,
The Three Flowers (*sān huā*) surge after their season—
No need to shun a thousand days of toil,
To welcome and escort into Heaven’s gate.

Wooden Male returns as Female,
Golden Female transforms into Child—
Holy Water (*shèng shuǐ*) uplifts the form,
Divine Flame (*líng yān*) refines the outward grace.

The Jade Patriarch (*yù wēng*) passes on the essence,
The Queen Mother (*wáng mǔ*) binds the pair—
Three years of Elixir’s radiance shine,
Immortal sages admire the sacred union.

To know the Elixir’s root,
One must grasp Heaven-Earth’s Lead—
Once Buan (Heaven-Earth) opens in accord,
The High Abyss (*gāo kàn*) stands ready before you.

Water and Fire temper the *Qingxing* (emotion-nature),
Yin-Yang pair without deviation—
After three years of effort,
A single grain ascends to the celestial.

The Dao’s light reveals the void within,
The lost laugh at the false and the unseen—
Descending with Earth’s Spirit,
Responding to Heaven’s talisman.

True Gold (*zhēn jīn*) is born,
Married to the Wooden Crone (*mù lǎo nú*)—
Three cycles of brilliance blaze,
The name proclaimed in the Imperial Court.

Yin-Yang breathe the Vital Essence (*jīng*),
*Xiāngtài* (mutual prosperity) harmonizes the Spirit—
The White Tiger stands in the first realm,
The Green Dragon merges in the second year.

The Three Flowers (*sān huā*) move in hidden cycles,
The Four Symbols (*sìxiàng*) must all be traversed—
Ten days of separation crumble,
Returning to the True leaves no form to refine.

The Tiger thrives from Black Water,
The Dragon changes, shedding its Red Seal—
Both merge with the Divine Qi (*shén qì*),
The Three Refined (*sān fǎn*) align with the Holy Method (*shèng fāng*).

Yin-Yang amplify the Elixir’s power,
Cold and Heat cycle the Flower’s radiance—
After Seven Returns and Nine Circulations (*qī fǎn jiǔ huán*),
Effortless longevity (*xiāobì yǒng shòu*) shall endure.

Lead (*língqiān*) is the sovereign,
Mercury (*línggōng*) is the Fire-Lead’s subject—
Awakening to Yin-Yang’s logic,
One then knows the *Qingxing*’s true nature.

East and West unite in Metal-Wood,
Months, days, and hours align—
All Fire must pass through the Immortal Fire (*xiān huǒ*),
Only then can one master advance and retreat.

There is a substance that blends with Heaven’s workings,
No more than the True Adept (*dàshì*) knows—
To lie as Dragon, to rise as Tiger,
To call the groom the original wife.

Refining shifts through Metal-Wood,
Circulating the High Abyss (*kàn gāo*)—
The Three Flowers’ power spreads,
Ascending beyond the depths of ignorance.

Water and Fire in discord are common knowledge,
Few know how to forge the Elixir—
The Five Phases inverted in their turn,
Three years seal the Elixir’s sacred core.

Breathing unites with the Divine,
Yin-Yang move in joyous accord—
The Elixir’s work is complete,
Lightly ascending to the cloudy heights.

Yin-Yang invert in their course,
Sun and Moon forge the Elixir’s perfection—
The Dragon meets the Flower-Pool (*huā chí*) and dies,
The Tiger encounters the Spirit-Water (*shén shuǐ*) and lives.

East and West merge with the True Dao,
South and North cycle the Flower’s brilliance—
The Five Colors (*wǔ cǎi*) gather the True Qi (*zhēn qì*),
Soaring through space, the Crane’s carriage awaits.

Who discerns the Five Phases within?
The True Qi (*xiān qì*) flows south—
Year after year, the Golden Tiger receives,
Season by season, the Wooden Dragon grows greedy—

The Flower’s Heart (*huā xīn*) turns in bitter labor,
Refined into the Elixir’s sweet fragrance—
Above, the Mysterious Light (*xiān shàng guāng*) shines,
The Elixir complete, its power now serene.

Sun and Moon each cast their light,
The Vital Essence (*jīng*) flows, never dying—
The Dragon transforms in Wood-Fire’s embrace,
The Tiger changes in Water-Metal’s concealment.

The Four Symbols’ cycles converge,
The Five Phases return to the Earthly realm—
The Elixir is done in thirty months,
When taken, one attains Heaven’s hall.

The *Tài Yī* (Grand Unity) Divine Palace’s dust,
Shines brighter through the clear window—
Wood’s Vitality and Metal’s nature settled,
The Yellow Old Man (*huáng lǎo*) and Purple Wanderer (*zǐ yóu*) are true.

Wood-Fire’s Dragon soars and leaps,
Water-Metal’s Tiger stands guard—
The Five Phases’ Qi harmonizes,
The Elixir’s power invites the Immortal Guest (*xiān bīn*).」

The cold and heat qi rush in exchange,
The Immortals sense the seasons’ shift—
Seize the Dragon at *jiǎ*’s earth,
Hunt the Tiger where *gēng*’s waters lift.

Refine with Dragon’s son’s method,
Achieve success through Tiger’s child’s aid—
Capture the living, slay the sacred sage,
Nine cycles offered to Heaven’s time.

Sun and Moon radiate their splendor bright,
The Celestial Path’s law never strays—
Three Yangs sink into Black Water’s depth,
Tenth month aligns with Yellow Sprout’s birth.

The Tiger lies light in Metal’s grace,
The Dragon hides in Wood’s extravagant way—
Three times nine, Yin-Yang’s turn,
True essence reaches the Purple Vehicle’s ray.

Lead must not darken—truth revealed,
Mercury’s error lies in sand and silver’s guise—
Wood’s essence, spirit pure and holy,
Metal’s bloom enters the Divine Pool’s guise.

The Tiger’s birth wrapped in *rén-gǒu*,
The Dragon’s rise beside *jiǎ-yǐ*—
Heaven and Earth’s numbers turn complete,
Purple Wanderer’s light shines on humanity.

Mother transforms through Son’s essence,
Gold binds Wood’s family’s form—
Two years restore the face’s hue,
One moment steals the sun’s red glow.

Dissolve Yin to complete the Dao,
Refine qi into spiritual mastery—
Now the *Héi Dān* (Returning Elixir) is named,
Long life pierces the azure void.

There is a thing with hidden true name,
Born to commune with Heaven-Earth’s spirit—
The Sun Palace transmits bone-qi,
The Moon’s Cavern nurtures the body’s form.

Refine the Yang-soul to purity,
Dissolve the Yin-shadow to stillness—
*Bǐng-Dīng*’s martial arts now end,
One grain transcends the Three Pure Ones.

The Great Dao’s transmission is not vain,
It splits open Heaven-Earth’s origin—
Who knows the spirit-matter’s strangeness?
Only the Sage’s words reveal its truth.

The Tiger’s form arises from Lead’s alchemy,
The Dragon’s name comes from Mercury’s roar—
Refine with Sun and Moon’s full measure,
Then serve the Garden of Highest Immortals.

What is the Elixir’s profound logic?
From Yin, forge Yang’s essence—
Now divide the South-North methods,
East-West chambers stand complete.

Dragon and Tiger breathe in concealment,
The *Fáng-Shēn*’s secret rules the hour—
Nine Returns, Seven Refinements,
The body surges, soaring without bound.

The spirit-sprout’s water holds sentiment,
Transformed to strength, its name is known—
Autumn harvests Metal’s marrow,
Spring stores Wood’s inner essence.

From *Kūn*’s path, grind the Purple,
Enter the Sage’s realm—light as Yellow—
*Wù-Jǐ* sits in the Central Palace,
Mutual support ascends to Highest Clarity.

Sitting in the Mysterious Elixir’s world,
Born from Heaven-Earth’s Lead—
Yin-Yang birth the Dragon and Tiger,
Gold and Wood forge the Elixir Field.

Advance and retreat the Three Blooms in secret,
Adjust and balance the Two Qi’s rotation—
From Non-Being, cultivate the Having,
Exchange bones to become Immortal Sage.

Black Mercury begets White Mercury,
From obscurity to Sage’s achievement—
The Southern soul endures in the North,
The Western shadow gestates in the East.

Sun and Moon’s Yin-Yang respond,
Husband and wife as matched pairs—
Three autumns, twenty-seven cycles,
The Elixir’s power reaches spiritual mastery.

There is a thing—*Tài Yīn*’s essence,
Only *Kūn*’s dew bears its true name—
Three methods reveal the True Path,
Five colors shine with clarity refined.

Refine the Tiger’s spirit, the Immortal’s way,
Boil the Dragon with Sun and Moon’s fire—
Merge and turn through cyclic numbers,
The body becomes holy, free from mortal ties.

Lead and Mercury’s names spread far,
Born from True Water and Fire’s essence—
Yellow Light produces White Mercury,
White Mercury transforms to Yellow Light.

Two substances merge as one body,
No single person can act alone—
Nine Yangs refine through sacred labor,
Fire’s end—all Immortals welcome.

Yellow Lead returns to Black Lead,
White Mercury’s holiness reveals the Mysterious—
The Western Marsh’s male counterpart,
The Eastern Palace’s female sage.

Marry as Sun and Moon decree,
Transform the Dao to become Immortal Sage—
Nine refinements—Elixir’s light appears,
Long life forgets the passage of years.

Creation’s power matches Heaven’s might,
The Returning Elixir’s scrolls are complete—
Yin-Yang harmonize the Five Colors,
Lead and Mercury cycle the Three Mysteries.

Dragon and Tiger’s essences breathe,
The *Fáng-Shēn*’s constellation simmers in secret—
Do not abandon True Water and Fire,
Refine to ascend as Immortal Sage.

Five colors from one essence born,
Three Elements through nine cycles turn—
True Yin-Yang’s hues stand correct,
True Water and Fire are boiled to perfection.

True Mercury stands through Lead’s foundation,
True Dragon transforms to Tiger’s name—
Refine its light with Sun and Moon,
Three times nine—its truth is clear.

Who would not wish for eternal life?
To save the world, seek the Elixir’s art—
Lead ascends to Spirit Peak’s search,
Mercury follows the Divine Water’s quest.

Boil in water through nine summers,
Refine in fire through three autumns—
The Golden Chamber’s labor complete,
Return to Heaven—freedom attained.

One breath within the Dao’s Mysterious,
Yin-Yang arrayed in Nature’s law—
The Flower Pool communicates with Black Water,
True Mercury yearns for Yellow Lead.

The White Tiger is born in the tenth month,
The Green Dragon follows in two years—
Refine through three times nine months,
Lightly ascend to meet the Immortals.

The Great Returning Elixir of Dragon and Tiger,
To ponder is rare, to attain is rare—
Once found, it is as turning the palm,
Yet without it, guard the Empty Hall’s gate.

Yang-Mercury births Original Qi,
Yin-Sand endures through cold’s harsh years—
The Three Blooms follow seasonal cues,
Worthy to offer to the Jade Emperor’s gaze.

Water and Fire’s union is arduous,
Who knows how to forge the Elixir?
The Five Phases shift in reversal,
Three years pass without a single flaw.

Breathing communicates with the spirit’s stillness,
Yin-Yang’s operation brings joy—
The labor’s spirit-matter is complete,
Lightly ascend to the clouds’ embrace.

Yin-Yang’s reversal in motion,
Sun and Moon cast the Elixir’s form—
The Dragon meets the Flower Pool and dies,
The Tiger encounters Divine Water and lives.

East and West unite the True Path,
South and North circulate the Blooms’ light—
The Five Colors’ true qi is gathered,
A crane’s carriage ascends to welcome.

Who recognizes the Inner Five Phases?
The Mysterious True-qi nourishes the South—
A year the Golden Tiger receives,
A changing season the Wooden Dragon craves—

The cycles turn the Flower’s bitter heart,
Refined, the medicine’s taste becomes sweet—
The Mysterious Light now shines,
The Elixir’s completion is serene beyond measure.

Sun and Moon each cast their light,
The Vital Essence flows, never dying—
The Dragon transforms in Wood-Fire’s embrace,
The Tiger changes in Water-Metal’s concealment.

The Four Symbols’ cycles converge,
The Five Phases return to the Earthly realm—
The Elixir is done in thirty months,
When taken, one attains Heaven’s hall.

The *Tài Yī* Divine Palace’s dust,
Shines brighter through the clear window—
Wood’s Vitality and Metal’s nature settled,
The Yellow Old Man and Purple Wanderer are true.

Wood-Fire’s Dragon soars and leaps,
Water-Metal’s Tiger stands guard—
The Five Phases’ Qi harmonizes,
The Elixir’s power invites the Immortal Guest.

The cold and heat qi rush in exchange,
The Immortals sense the seasons’ shift—
Seize the Dragon at *jiǎ*’s earth,
Hunt the Tiger where *gēng*’s waters lift.

The Lead’s hair, unblackened, is true,
Mercury refined with silver sand’s aid—
The Dragon’s fluid, spirit and essence, is sacred,
The Metal’s brilliance in the Pool of Divinity.

The Tiger is born in *Rén-Jǐ*’s embrace,
The Dragon rises near *Jiǎ-Yǐ*’s kin—
Heaven and Earth’s cycles turn complete,
The Purple Wanderer’s light shines upon mortals.

Mother’s essence, child’s transformation, is *Wēng*,
The Metal’s essence, Wood’s family, is *Róng*—
In two years, the hue returns,
In one breath, the sun’s red is seized.

Dissolving the Yin, the Dao is perfected,
Refining the *qi*, the Spirit’s passage is achieved—
The *Huan* of the True Elixir is named,
Long life ascends through the Azure void.

There is a hidden thing, its true name unknown,
Born of the Heaven-Earth’s sacred breath—
The Sun’s palace transmits *bone-qi*,
The Moon’s cavern nurtures the body’s form—
Refining the Yang soul is correct,
Dispelling the Yin shadow is done.

*Bǐng-Dīng*’s martial and civil are severed,
One grain suffices to cross the Three Pure Ones.

The Great Dao is not falsely passed down,
It splits open the Heaven-Earth’s origin—
The ignorant miss the subtle marvels,
The enlightened hear the Sage’s words.

Forging the Tiger through Lead’s transformation,
Naming the Dragon with Mercury’s proclamation—
Refining with Sun and Moon’s full measure,
Only then does one enter the Immortal Garden.

What is the logic of the Supreme Medicine?
Refining the Yin to birth the Yang—
Now dividing the South-North paths,
The East-West chambers are made right.

The Dragon and Tiger lie in breath,
The *Fáng Cān* hosts unseen guidance—
Nine returns, seven refineries,
The body surges, soaring aloft.

The spirit-sprout’s water has feeling,
Changing water earns the name *Qiáng*—
Autumn harvests the Metal’s marrow,
Spring stores the Wood’s inner essence.

From *Kūn*’s passage, refining Purple,
Entering the Sage, the Yellow is lightened—
*Wù-Jǐ* sits in the Central Palace,
Mutual aid ascends to the Upper Pure.

Sitting in the world’s elixir’s mystery,
Life begins from Heaven-Earth’s Lead—
Yin and Yang produce Dragon and Tiger,
Metal and Wood forge the Elixir Field.

Advance and retreat in the Three Blooms’ secrecy,
Balancing the Two *qi*’s rotation—
From the void, refining yields the full,
Changing bones, the Sage’s path is true.

Black Mercury births White Mercury,
From *Mēng* to the Sage’s work is done—
The Southern soul grows from the North,
The Western shadow gestates in the East.

Sun and Moon, Yin and Yang, resonate,
Spouses match as one—
In three autumns, twenty-seven cycles,
The Elixir’s power reaches the Spirit’s passage.

There is a thing of the Supreme Yin’s essence,
Only *Kūn*’s dew bears its true name—
The Three Refineries align the True Path,
The Five Colors grow ever distinct.

The Tiger lies, the Sage refines,
The Dragon is roasted in Sun and Moon’s broth—
Uniting the cycles of the scriptures,
The body’s Sage transcends mortal emotion.

Lead and Mercury’s names are far-reaching,
From the True, Water-Fire is born—
The Yellow is lightened, producing White Mercury,
White Mercury transforms into Yellow’s lightness.

The Two Essences harmonize as one,
A single person cannot follow both—
Nine Yangs refine to reveal the True,
The Fire’s end, all Immortals welcome.

Yellow Lead returns to Black Lead,
White Mercury’s refinement is profound—
The Western Pool hosts the male counterpart,
The Eastern Palace marvels at the female sage.

Union follows the Sun and Moon’s rhythm,
Transformation proves the Sage’s path—
Nine refineries, the Elixir’s light reveals itself,
Long life knows no count of years.

Creation’s force matches the Heavenly,
The Elixir’s text is listed within—
Yin and Yang balance the Five Colors,
Lead and Mercury move the Three Mysteries.

The Dragon and Tiger’s essence breathes,
The *Fáng Cān* hosts unseen alchemy—
Do not abandon the True Water-Fire,
Refining invites the Sage’s path.

The Five Colors, one essence, are born,
The Three Elements perform nine transformations—
The True Yin-Yang hues are correct,
The True Water-Fire is refined to completion.

True Mercury stands through Lead’s foundation,
True Dragon transforms as Tiger—
Refining with Sun and Moon’s light,
Three Nines display their clarity.

Sun and Moon bestow eternal life,
*Qián-Kūn*’s balance is inherent—
The Elixir’s logic is profound,
The Great Dao’s essence is boundless.

Four-Five’s Metal Bloom is fair,
Six-Three’s Wood stands true—
External flames align with inner fire,
Glory and shame are left to others’ strife.

True Water emerges from *Qián*’s origin,
True Metal is born from Wood’s gate—
The Spirit Pool collects the Tiger’s shadow,
The Sacred Fire subdues the Dragon’s soul.

Sun and Moon restrain the soul and shadow,
Yin and Yang refine the children and descendants—
Nine returns to *Wù-Jǐ*,
The Crane’s journey pays homage to the Heavenly Sage.

The Metal’s fluid, the Great Elixir’s poem, is complete.

chunks.original_text: 金液大丹诗 经名：金液大丹诗。 一卷。 撰人不详，疑出于唐代。 底本出处：《正统道藏》太玄部。 金液大丹诗 一物产乾坤，二仪生药根，阴灵合地魄，阳气出天魂。 化虎行金路，飞龙隐木门，日精煎月影，数足住昆仑。 真水伏真火，火真出美金，金真伐木化，归土生同钦。 日月阴阳炼，风云龙虎擒，三回四五足，度世兔浮沈。 造化久沈浮，须抛生死枯，红铅天界重，白汞道门殊。 禀气神龙虎，成形道妇夫，阴阳真水火，炼毕诣仙都。 九转运三般，真心炼不难，虎生神水猛，龙化圣金宽。 金木情通体，乾坤产大丹，五行精入腹，策上九霄坛。 人知千日铅，真汞自相连，修炼三秋毕，煎成一虎颠。 龙威慑虎踞，虎猛慑龙眠，生化门开胜，神丹出世玄。 一物合天长，九还七返光，随铅觅不得，逐汞隐飞扬。 化虎通泉伏，为龙入火藏，神明通大道，炼出药中王。 识得木精华，堪栽池上芽，调匀分火焰，收取美金花。 猛虎神光敛，潜龙闪电差，一时悟圣道，千日炼朝霞。 论铅不识铅，焉知理又玄，青龙非起伏，白虎隐藏眠。 暗合和真气，分明感上仙，修丹功力太，了毕志通天。 壬癸大丹池，丙丁真药基，庚辛生虎力，甲乙曜龙威。 日月增光彩，阴阳换素衣，神仙传火候，戊己戴人飞。 因思内五行，契地合天并，化虎成金体，生龙表木形。 三花分节炼，一物裹边经，七返九还后，超凡入圣灵。 明取大丹心，水银中且寻，东龙才际会，西虎自相钦。 情性通和睦，含藏呼吸深，炼成真一气，度世脱浮沈。 大道本无名，灵丹显道行，乾坤开圣物，龙虎产神明。 水火真元气，阴阳炼日精，月轮三十六，灿烂服长生。 一者水为真，三通仙路人，四开花曜日，二炼魄精神。 五彩全阳气，九还丹出尘，运经十二季，生化起腾身。 铅汞大丹君，真人类合群，乾坤孕灵气，龙虎擘开淳。 五彩光明显，三般情性分，炼经九转后，拔宅入青云。 达者更重观，还丹药五般，仙人亲手炼，凡士役心传。 识虎从师觅，知龙审道看，三冬文武转，光照九天寒。 神水灌华池，有无生化知，青龙交虎体，白虎吸龙脂。 二物通神圣，三般混彩仪，炼花千日上，成土奉天时。 入道切知非，斋心察尽微，身名仙界许，铅汞圣归依。 龙虎还丹本，夫妻喻药基，阴阳分志诀，了悟得人稀。 有物使人迷，神仙上遍窥，火龙披水廓，水虎建金脾。 化虎称真婿，征龙立圣妻，成亲生大道，迎入九功闺。 道开天地齐，仙路莫能窥，铅汞分明悟，云车驾不迷。 坎高定南北，震兑正东西，四象烧龙虎，奇功志不低。 经诀论参同，阴阳北起南，儿年四五六，女岁十二三。 日月交昏偶，夫妻美更贪，化丹因火道，九转不虚谈。 灵丹显道潜，一气运行炎，感日月交媾，化虎龙蚀咸。 仙人戏金木，旦暮弄乌蟾，开悟长生理，因铅谢老聘。 铅汞运春秋，乾坤中好修，功成超世药，饵后达天游。 阳炼魂生聚，阴消魄散收，牵龙并啖虎，二物圣通流。 道在目前求，黄芽不着搜，金山开虎谷，木水畎龙漱。 阳气龙呼出，阴风虎吸收，灵炎烧圣水，丹化九天游。 青龙白虎学，铅配合通家，男女同情性，夫妻耀彩霞。 阴阳中一物，旦暮猛三华，十八甲子后，凌云路不差。

**Gold Elixir Great Elixir Poem**

Title: *Gold Elixir Great Elixir Poem*
One scroll.
Author unknown, likely from the Tang Dynasty.
Source: *Zhengtong Daozang*, Taixuan Section.

---

**Gold Elixir Great Elixir Poem**

One substance born of Heaven-Earth,
Two polarities nurture the medicinal root—
Yin-essence merges with Earth’s spirit,
Yang-qi emanates from Heaven’s soul.

Transformed as a tiger, it treads the Golden Path,
As a dragon, it hides within the Wooden Gate.
Solar essence refines the lunar shadow,
Counted steps secure it at Kunlun’s peak.

True Water submits to True Fire,
Fire’s perfection forges noble gold,
Gold’s perfection fells the Wood and transforms,
Returning to Earth, it earns reverence.

Sun and Moon refine yin and yang,
Wind and Clouds ensnare Dragon and Tiger.
Three cycles, four and five complete,
Transcending the world’s rise and fall.

Creation long submerged in flux,
Must cast off life’s decayed husk—
Red lead weighs heavy in Heaven’s realm,
White mercury stands apart in Dao’s gate.

Inheriting qi, the divine Dragon-Tiger,
Formed, the Dao’s husband and wife.
Yin-yang’s True Water and Fire,
Refined, they ascend to the Celestial Capital.

Nine transformations govern the three essences,
True-hearted refinement is no hardship—
The Tiger’s birth yields fierce divine water,
The Dragon’s change produces saintly gold.

Gold and Wood’s affinity unites the body,
Heaven-Earth forge the Great Elixir.
The Five Phases’ essence enters the abdomen,
Ascending the Nine-Heaven Altar.

Men know lead’s thousand-day alchemy,
True mercury binds itself—
Three autumns’ cultivation complete,
Boiled, it becomes the Tiger’s peak.

Dragon’s might subdues the Tiger’s crouch,
The Tiger’s ferocity tames the Dragon’s repose—
Life’s transformation opens the Victorious Gate,
Divine Elixir emerges in Mysterious Play.

One substance harmonizes with Heaven’s span,
Nine returns, seven illuminations—
Chase lead, yet it eludes,
Pursue mercury, it vanishes aloft.

Transformed as Tiger, it submerges in the Spring,
As Dragon, it hides in Fire’s treasure.
Divine clarity penetrates the Great Dao,
Refined, it crowns the King of Medicines.

Recognizing Wood’s vital essence,
Worthy of planting on the pool’s brink—
Balanced, it divides the Fire’s flame,
Harvesting noble gold’s bloom.

The Tiger’s fierce light is gathered,
The Dragon’s lightning flashes—
At once, the Saintly Dao is realized,
A thousand days refine the morning’s glow.

Discussing lead yet not knowing lead,
How can one grasp the profound principle?
The Green Dragon does not rise and fall,
The White Tiger hides in repose.

Darkly merging with True Qi,
Clearly sensing the High Immortal—
Cultivation’s power is vast,
Completion reveals Heaven’s intent.

The *Ren-Gui* Great Elixir Pool,
*Bing-Ding* as the True Medicine’s foundation,
*Geng-Xin* births the Tiger’s might,
*Jia-Yi* radiates the Dragon’s awe.

Sun and Moon enhance their splendor,
Yin and Yang exchange their robes—
Immortal transmission of Fire’s timing,
*Wu-Ji* wears the flying man’s crown.

Reflecting the Inner Five Phases,
Contracting Earth, harmonizing with Heaven,
Transforming the Tiger into a Golden Body,
Giving birth to the Dragon in Wooden Form.

Three Flowers refine by nodes,
One substance wraps the boundary script—
After seven returns and nine transformations,
Transcending the mundane, entering the Saintly Spirit.

Clarifying the Great Elixir’s core,
Seek within the mercury’s depths—
The Eastern Dragon meets its fate,
The Western Tiger pays homage.

Affinity and nature blend in harmony,
Containing breath, profound and deep—
Refined, it becomes the True One Qi,
Transcending the world, free from rise and fall.

The Great Dao is nameless in origin,
The Soul Elixir reveals its operation—
Heaven-Earth open the Sacred Thing,
Dragon and Tiger birth the Divine.

Water and Fire’s True Primordial Qi,
Yin and Yang refine the Solar Essence—
The Moon’s thirty-six revolutions,
Resplendent, granting eternal life.

One is True Water,
Three open the Immortal Path—
Four bloom the Flower of Days,
Two refine the Spirit-Soul.

Five hues manifest the Yang Qi,
Nine returns, the Elixir ascends from dust—
Circulating the Twelve Seasons’ script,
Life’s transformation lifts the body aloft.

Lead and Mercury’s Great Elixir Lord,
True Persons unite as one—
Heaven-Earth nurture the numinous Qi,
Dragon and Tiger split the Primordial Purity.

Five hues shine with clarity,
Three essences’ natures divide—
After nine transformations’ refinement,
The dwelling is abandoned, ascending to Azure Clouds.

The enlightened observe further,
Returning Elixirs in five forms—
Immortal hands personally refine,
Mortals transmit with devoted hearts.

Seeking the Tiger from a master’s guidance,
Knowing the Dragon through Dao’s scrutiny—
Three winters, the Martial and Civil turn,
Light illuminates the Nine-Heaven’s chill.

Divine Water irrigates the Flower Pool,
Knowing the interplay of presence and absence—
Green Dragon merges with the Tiger’s body,
White Tiger absorbs the Dragon’s fat.

Two substances communicate the Sacred,
Three essences blend in resplendent ritual—
A thousand days refine the Flower,
Completed, it honors Heaven’s timing.

Entering the Dao, one must know its non-duality,
With a pure heart, discerning the subtle—
Name and form granted in the Immortal Realm,
Lead and Mercury return to the Sacred.

Dragon and Tiger’s Returning Elixir’s root,
Husband and wife symbolize the medicinal foundation—
Yin and Yang’s division holds the secret key,
Few awaken to its profound truth.

A substance that ensnares the mind,
Immortal sages explore its depths—
The Fire Dragon sheds its Water shell,
The Water Tiger erects its Golden Spleen.

Transformed as Tiger, it becomes the True Groom,
Summoning the Dragon, it establishes the Saintly Bride—
Their union births the Great Dao,
Inviting them to the Nine-Function Chamber.

The Dao opens, aligning Heaven and Earth,
No mortal can glimpse the Immortal Path—
Lead and Mercury clearly reveal the truth,
The Cloud-Carriage’s path is unerring.

The Abyss defines South and North,
Thunder and Dipper align East and West—
Four Symbols ignite Dragon and Tiger,
Extraordinary function, resolve unyielding.

Scriptures and precepts discuss unity,
Yin and Yang rise from the North to South—
The Boy’s years: four, five, six,
The Girl’s years: twelve, thirteen.

Sun and Moon’s union in twilight’s embrace,
Husband and wife’s beauty grows ever more coveted—
Elixir’s transformation follows the Fire’s Dao,
Nine transformations—no idle talk.

The Soul Elixir reveals the hidden Dao,
One Qi circulates in the flames—
Responding to the Sun and Moon’s union,
Transforming Tiger and Dragon, salty and pungent.

Immortal sages play with Gold and Wood,
Morning and evening, they toy with the Black Hare—
Awakening to the principle of eternal life,
Through lead, they reject the old guest’s invitation.

Lead and Mercury cycle through spring and autumn,
Heaven-Earth’s midst is good for cultivation—
Completion yields the world-transcending medicine,
After ingestion, one attains Heaven’s roaming.

Yang-refinement gathers the born Soul,
Yin-dissolution scatters the dispersed Spirit—
Dragging the Dragon, devouring the Tiger,
Two substances flow in Sacred Communion.

The Dao is sought before one’s eyes,
Golden sprouts are not grasped in search—
The Golden Mountain opens the Tiger’s Valley,
Wooden Water washes the Dragon’s jaws.

Yang-qi, the Dragon’s breath, exhales,
Yin-wind, the Tiger’s inhalation—
Divine Flame burns the Sacred Water,
The Elixir ascends, soaring the Nine-Heavens.

Green Dragon and White Tiger study,
Lead and Mercury unite as kin—
Male and female share affinity,
Husband and wife radiate in crimson clouds.

Yin and Yang’s singular substance,
Morning and evening, fierce in the Three Flowers—
After eighteen Heavenly Stems,
The Cloud-Piercing Path is unerring.

chunks.original_text: 阴阳隐药苞，仙使降开抄，大道神通毕，还丹圣不抛。 龙情左畔书，虎性右边交，幢下元君喜，玄门羽客敲。 一物灌三金，五行谙历探，西收停虎啸，东摄定龙吟。 圣地成丹体，唯天合道心，炼阳三九转，仙众叹皆钦。 日月大丹精，神仙显至灵，阴阳和会毕，龙虎自交并。 水火通真气，朝昏体炼形，三回寒暑力，甘美味唯馨。 进道理何凭，持心挣若冰，黄铅招感应，黑汞露精凝。 二物生光灿，三花运彩兴，阴精消亦绝，阳力蹑云升。 黑水净幽沈，白铅得处深，西金伏东木，东木本西金。 际会难分手，和同契合心，三秋经历后，千日炼光阴。 万物脱其形，三才人最灵，知铅修汞诀，明道合天经。 炼虎通丹力，擒龙制药馨，才经寒暑尽，真入会仙亭。 铅汞远传声，由其水火蒸，应天地神圣，合日月交胜。 化道含灵气，令人不坏崩，金丹三载炼，一粒起云腾。 道本隐玄微，开因五彩基，通天票灵气，圣地炼光辉。 云掩龙生化，风停虎丧威，九秋炉裹见，脱体挂仙衣。 修丹志莫论，铅汞得称尊，养汞华池产，收龙圣火存。 阴阳翻复炼，日月往来奔，运动三花遍，仙人喜到门。 一正药根源，二关龙虎门，三凭日月化，四炼魄并魂， 五拔阴阳力，六调寒暑暄，七真神圣见，八喜利乾坤。 二物合相逢，阴阳结气浓，水沈生白虎，火猛产青龙。 造化神功感，通灵圣莫穷，五行千日炼，云鹤驾亲供。 铅汞日相随，人多不悟迷，杳冥港水土，灿烂照东西。 情性神光结，阴阳圣力齐，调停二十七，仙籍已标题。 铅汞久闻名，知玄少得成，红铅出黑液，白汞入黄轻。 龙虎生金髓，房参化木精，运花千日裹，入腹九霄迎。 真汞神仙息，真铅圣药基，宿生曾近别，才说悟玄机。 三载神丹耀，九还光色晖，后来修道者，问取紫河衣。 唯道包天地，乾坤出药头，五行俱感化，四象遍经流。 神水为元首，灵金入木修，谁知真火圣，变土九天游。 木产宝堪任，水裹出真金，内五行精得，此三般物深。 炼阴阳气圣，养虎得龙钦，火候终千日，丹光仙众临。 大药重还丹，冲天一粒餐，龙威擒虎力，虎猛摄龙摊。 二载同胎后，三般摘一般，入神又十月，成土坐金坛。 水土要知真。 坤元胜地亲，震潜灵圣木，离寄火金身。 内五行须识，修千日炼神，精搜穷八卦，龙虎裹藏珍。 堪嗟浮世界，难抛生死门，速须修圣药，才就敌乾坤。 神水煎龙魄，灵炎炼虎魂，功夫三载后，一粒面天尊。 静想转沈浮，分明道不辜，神仙应悟达，生死摆荣枯。 大道根元化，修身赋命苏，五行真诀了，如顶灌酝酬。 黄铅胜入玄，黑汞涌灵泉，二气相逢合，三花暗裹煎。 东西依日月，南北运时年，功夫三载后，光明策列仙。 无形闻大道，有药隐幽玄，真水回真火，红铅谢黑铅。 五行收气足，四象返风旋，运火阴阳匝，灵丹照碧天。 乾坤交泰时，日月孕华池，青木三花隐，白金七女知。 夫妻正金木，各产虎龙儿，九转三周毕，通灵更不疑。 兑泽藏金虎，震雷潜木龙，雨风交际会，情性合温恭。 水土荣根蒂，阴阳灼本容，宿绿明妙理，不与世人同。 真铅在杳冥，恍惚好藏形，南北先交结，东西后合并。 三年行火力，九转得丹馨，寒暑阴阳胜，乾坤产药灵。

「The Dao/Way enfolds the hidden elixir within the Yin-Yang embrace,
Immortal messengers descend to open and transcribe.
The Great Dao/Way’s divine communion is complete—
The Returned Elixir’s sacred essence is never cast aside.

Dragon’s *emotion/qing* is inscribed on the left bank,
Tiger’s *nature/xing* is recorded on the right—
Beneath the banner, the Primordial Lord rejoices,
At the Mystic Gate, feathered disciples knock.

One substance irrigates the Three *Jins* (refinements),
The Five Phases are mastered through profound inquiry—
Westward gather the Tiger’s roaring halt,
Eastward seize the Dragon’s resonant stillness.

In the Sacred Land, the Elixir’s form is perfected,
Only Heaven’s alignment harmonizes with the Dao/Way-heart—
Refining Yang through three *jius* (ninefold cycles),
Divine beings sigh in reverence and awe.

The Sun-Moon Elixir’s essence is most refined,
Gods and Immortals display their utmost sacredness—
When Yin-Yang’s union is complete,
Dragon and Tiger spontaneously merge and coalesce.

Water and Fire harmonize the *Zhenqi* (True Qi),
Morning and evening embody the refined form—
Three cycles of cold and heat’s power,
Sweet and exquisite flavor, its fragrance alone.

How does one advance in Dao/Way’s path?—no surety,
Clutching the heart like ice, yet firm—
Yellow Lead summons response and resonance,
Black Mercury reveals the essence’s condensation.

Two substances generate radiant brilliance,
The Three Flowers bloom with vibrant hues—
When Yin-essence fades, it vanishes utterly,
Yang-power ascends, riding the clouds.

Black Water purifies the profound depths,
White Lead attains its hidden essence—
Westward *Jin* (Metal) subdues Eastward Wood,
Eastward Wood originates from Westward *Jin*.

At their appointed meeting, hands cannot be parted,
In perfect harmony, hearts contract—
After three autumns of cultivation,
A thousand days refine the light and shade.

All things shed their mortal forms,
The Three Talents (Heaven, Earth, Man) are most spiritually sublime—
Know the Lead’s refinement and Mercury’s secret,
Clarify the Dao/Way to harmonize with Heaven’s script.

Refining the Tiger’s Elixir-power,
Capturing the Dragon’s essence to brew—
Once cold and heat are exhausted,
The True Self enters the Immortal Pavilion.

Lead and Mercury’s fame spreads far,
Yet few perceive their hidden Dao/Way—
Obscure and distant, harboring Water and Earth,
Dazzling and illuminating, casting light east and west.

*Qingxing* (emotion-nature) and divine light unite,
Yin-Yang’s sacred power converges—
Twenty-seven adjustments perfected,
One’s name is already inscribed in the Immortal Register.

Though Lead and Mercury are oft-heard of,
Few grasp their profound mysteries—
Red Lead emerges from Black Elixir,
White Mercury enters, light as Yellow.

Dragon and Tiger generate Golden Marrow,
Room (chamber) and Parameter (bedchamber) refine Wooden Essence—
A thousand days nurture the Three Flowers,
Nine Heavens welcome within the belly.

True Mercury rests with the Immortals,
True Lead grounds the Sacred Elixir—
In past births, one neared them briefly,
Now the Dao/Way’s mystery is unveiled.

Three years, the Divine Elixir shines,
Nine returns radiate luminous hues—
Later practitioners of the Dao/Way,
Seek the *Zihe* (Purple River) Robe.

The Dao/Way alone encompasses Heaven-Earth,
Bukan and *Kun* (Heaven-Earth) yield the Elixir’s peak—
The Five Phases all respond and transform,
The Four Symbols (trigrams) flow through every scripture.

Divine Water is the Primordial Sovereign,
True *Jin* (Metal) enters Wood’s refinement—
Who knows the Sacred Fire’s truth?
It transmutes Earth, ascending Nine Heavens.

Wood bears treasures fit for use,
Water enfolds True *Jin*—
Within the Five Phases’ essence is secured,
These Three *Bans* (substances) are profound.

Refining Yin-Yang’s Sacred Qi,
Nurturing the Tiger to earn the Dragon’s reverence—
A thousand days of fire’s culmination,
The Elixir’s light shines upon the Divine.

The Great Elixir returns as Returned Elixir,
A single grain ascends, piercing Heaven—
The Dragon’s might subdues the Tiger’s power,
The Tiger’s ferocity captures the Dragon’s breath.

Two years of shared gestation,
Three *Bans* (substances) distilled into one—
Ten months of divine penetration,
Earth is formed, seated upon the Golden Furnace.

True Water and Earth must be known—
*Kun*’s Primordial Victory is the Earthly Root,
*Zhen*’s hidden essence is the Sacred Wood,
*Li*’s borrowed fire is the *Jin*’s form.

The Five Phases must be discerned,
A thousand days refine the Spirit—
Essence is gathered, exhausting the Eight Trigrams,
Dragon and Tiger enfold treasures within.

Alas, the floating world is fleeting,
Hard to abandon the Gate of Life and Death—
Swiftly cultivate the Sacred Elixir,
Only then can one rival Heaven-Earth.

Divine Water decocts the Dragon’s *po* (spirit),
Sacred Flame refines the Tiger’s *hun* (soul)—
After three years of labor,
A single grain faces Heaven’s glory.

Still contemplation transforms sinking and floating,
Clarity of the Dao/Way knows no betrayal—
Divine beings should awaken to its truth,
Life and Death sway like withering and flourishing.

The Great Dao/Way’s root is transformation,
Cultivating the body to revive one’s fate—
The Five Phases’ true secrets are revealed,
Like a crown, pouring nectar as recompense.

Yellow Lead triumphs in entering the Mystic,
Black Mercury surges from the Spirit’s spring—
Two Qi meet and merge,
The Three Flowers are secretly wrapped and decocted.

East and West follow the Sun-Moon’s rhythm,
South and North move with the passing years—
After three years of labor,
Luminous light ranks the Immortals.

Formless, one hears the Great Dao/Way,
With Elixir, the Mystic is concealed—
True Water returns to True Fire,
Red Lead replaces Black Lead.

The Five Phases gather Qi fully,
The Four Symbols reverse the winds’ rotation—
Fire circulates through Yin-Yang’s embrace,
The Sacred Elixir gleams in the Azure Sky.

When *Bukan* and *Kun* harmonize in *Tai* (peace),
Sun-Moon nurture the *Hua* (Flower) Pool—
Green Wood’s Three Flowers are hidden,
White *Jin*’s Seven Maidens know.

Husband and Wife align as *Jin* and Wood,
Each birthing Tiger and Dragon offspring—
Nine turns and three cycles complete,
The Spirit’s communion leaves no doubt.

*Duì*’s (Lake) brilliance conceals the Golden Tiger,
*Zhen*’s (Thunder) rumble harbors the Wooden Dragon—
Rain and wind meet at their appointed hour,
*Qingxing* (emotion-nature) merges in warmth and reverence.

Water and Earth nourish the root and stem,
Yin-Yang sears the fundamental essence—
Past verdant clarity reveals profound logic,
Not shared with the common worldly folk.

True Lead dwells in the distant void,
Faintly visible, its form concealed—
First, South and North unite,
Then East and West merge together.

Three years of Fire’s power in motion,
Nine turns yield the Elixir’s fragrance—
Cold and heat, Yin and Yang prevail,
Heaven-Earth produce the Elixir’s sacredness.»

chunks.original_text: 大道人难识，谁知内五行，乾坤权掌内，魂魄上心明。 地魄开真理，天魂露圣灵，若教通此物，身挂九天名。 水土孕黄芽，火金生白花，东邻娇女爱，西舍好儿夸。 和会因三载，阴阳媒两家，庚辛室裹炼，千日变朝霞。 水火成肌骨，木金生药根，黄铅生白信，白汞谢蟾恩。 四象轮流定，三花节后奔，莫辞千日苦，迎送入天门。 木男回作女，金女转为儿，圣水擢形体，灵炎炼表仪。 玉翁传物象，王母配夫妻，三岁丹光照，神仙慕结知。 欲识药根源，须知天地铅，乾坤开启后，高坎已当前。 水火调情性，阴阳配不偏，功夫三载后，一粒起腾天。 明道无中有，迷途笑有无，降天陪地魄，感地合天符。 产出真金子，婚他木姥奴，三周光灿烂，名已奏皇都。 阴阳呼吸精，交泰感通灵，白虎一宫立，青龙二载并。 三花潜运转，四象总须经，十日离全塌，归真不炼形。 虎生因黑水，龙变脱红章，二物通神气，三般合圣方。 阴阳增药力，寒暑运花光，七返九还后，逍逼永寿长。 灵铅水银君，灵汞火铅臣，悟得阴阳理，方知情性真。 东西金木合，年月日时亲，凡火通仙火，须明进退频。 有物混天机，无非达士知，为龙伏作虎，呼婿本来妻。 转弄从金木，周旋别坎高，三花功力遍，超胜离愚痴。 水火不和比，世人共所知，内藏真水火，匹配美夫妻。 功力玄难晓，谁明颠倒支，五行呼吸遍，千日药无疑。 大道分清烛，先开众妙门，真铅孕阴魄，真汞产阳魂。 蟾影煎灵魄，乌精炼圣魂，延年重阴火，灵药对乾坤。 阴火仙人闻，阳波羽客分，二门开悟理，三物显殊勋。 虎啸称金父，龙吟正火君，气行依历数，三十月腾云。 长生道可穷，丹好论仙容，虎性生龙体，龙情着虎踪。 虚无神感化，自有胜相从，五彩通天德，三秋绝火供。 举世重真铅，令人保命全，木魂随羽客，水魄问神仙。 恍惚蒙拢恍，玄中又更玄，炼经节后正，名挂九重天。 欲识白金花，坚求黑汞沙，不经从黑白，何处觅黄芽。 花自青龙血，砂从白虎芽，五行四象足，三载上河车。 阴阳颠倒颠，翻地复长天，真水呼真火，黄铅吸黑铅。 乾坤交泰合，龙虎喜同眠，运动三花绝，升腾彻上玄。 长生谁不愿，度世觅丹修，铅往灵峰探，汞随神水求。 水煎过九夏，火炼及三秋，金室功夫后，归天得自由。 一气道中玄，阴阳列自然，华池通黑水，真汞慕黄铅。 白虎生十月，青龙次二年，炼经三九月，轻举接神仙。 龙虎大还丹，寻思难得难，得来如反掌，未达守虚坛。 阳汞生元气，阴沙任岁寒，三花依节候，堪献玉皇看。 水火合多难，谁知作得丹，五行颠倒转，三载绝包弹。 呼吸通神静，阴阳运用欢，功夫灵药就，轻举入云端。 阴阳颠倒行，日月铸丹成，龙遇华池死，虎逢神水生。 东西合道正，南北运花明，五彩真收气，腾空鹤驾迎。 内五行谁识，玄真气沃南，经年金虎受，改岁木龙贪， 运转花心苦，修成药味甘，玄上光已照，丹就显宁堪。 日月各遗光，精流不死方，化龙木火裹，变虎水金藏。 四象经纶合，五行落土乡，丹成三十月，人服诣天堂。 太一神宫粉，明窗尘更亲，木精金性定，黄老紫游真。 木火龙飞跃，水金虎踞巡，五行气相感，丹力擢仙宾。

「The Great Dao is hard to discern,
Who knows the Five Phases within?
Buan (Heaven-Earth) holds the balance in its core,
The Soul and Spirit (*húnpò*) shine bright in the heart’s realm.

Earth’s Spirit (*dìpò*) reveals the True Principle,
Heaven’s Soul (*tiān hún*) unveils the Sacred Essence—
If one grasps this mystery,
Their name shall hang in the Nine Heavens’ glory.

Water and Earth nurture the Yellow Sprout,
Fire and Metal forge the White Flower—
The Eastern neighbor’s fair daughter takes delight,
The Western neighbor’s fine son boasts of his prowess.

Three years of harmonious union,
Yin-Yang as mediators between two homes,
The *Gēng Xīn* (Metal-Water) Chamber seals the refining,
A thousand days transform it into the dawn’s radiance.

Water and Fire form flesh and bone,
Wood and Metal cultivate the Elixir’s root—
True Lead (*huángqiān*) yields White Trust (*bái xìn*),
White Mercury (*bái gōng*) repays the Moon’s favor.

The Four Symbols (*sìxiàng*) cycle in fixed order,
The Three Flowers (*sān huā*) surge after their season—
No need to shun a thousand days of toil,
To welcome and escort into Heaven’s gate.

Wooden Male returns as Female,
Golden Female transforms into Child—
Holy Water (*shèng shuǐ*) uplifts the form,
Divine Flame (*líng yān*) refines the outward grace.

The Jade Patriarch (*yù wēng*) passes on the essence,
The Queen Mother (*wáng mǔ*) binds the pair—
Three years of Elixir’s radiance shine,
Immortal sages admire the sacred union.

To know the Elixir’s root,
One must grasp Heaven-Earth’s Lead—
Once Buan (Heaven-Earth) opens in accord,
The High Abyss (*gāo kàn*) stands ready before you.

Water and Fire temper the *Qingxing* (emotion-nature),
Yin-Yang pair without deviation—
After three years of effort,
A single grain ascends to the celestial.

The Dao’s light reveals the void within,
The lost laugh at the false and the unseen—
Descending with Earth’s Spirit,
Responding to Heaven’s talisman.

True Gold (*zhēn jīn*) is born,
Married to the Wooden Crone (*mù lǎo nú*)—
Three cycles of brilliance blaze,
The name proclaimed in the Imperial Court.

Yin-Yang breathe the Vital Essence (*jīng*),
*Xiāngtài* (mutual prosperity) harmonizes the Spirit—
The White Tiger stands in the first realm,
The Green Dragon merges in the second year.

The Three Flowers (*sān huā*) move in hidden cycles,
The Four Symbols (*sìxiàng*) must all be traversed—
Ten days of separation crumble,
Returning to the True leaves no form to refine.

The Tiger thrives from Black Water,
The Dragon changes, shedding its Red Seal—
Both merge with the Divine Qi (*shén qì*),
The Three Refined (*sān fǎn*) align with the Holy Method (*shèng fāng*).

Yin-Yang amplify the Elixir’s power,
Cold and Heat cycle the Flower’s radiance—
After Seven Returns and Nine Circulations (*qī fǎn jiǔ huán*),
Effortless longevity (*xiāobì yǒng shòu*) shall endure.

Lead (*língqiān*) is the sovereign,
Mercury (*línggōng*) is the Fire-Lead’s subject—
Awakening to Yin-Yang’s logic,
One then knows the *Qingxing*’s true nature.

East and West unite in Metal-Wood,
Months, days, and hours align—
All Fire must pass through the Immortal Fire (*xiān huǒ*),
Only then can one master advance and retreat.

There is a substance that blends with Heaven’s workings,
No more than the True Adept (*dàshì*) knows—
To lie as Dragon, to rise as Tiger,
To call the groom the original wife.

Refining shifts through Metal-Wood,
Circulating the High Abyss (*kàn gāo*)—
The Three Flowers’ power spreads,
Ascending beyond the depths of ignorance.

Water and Fire in discord are common knowledge,
Few know how to forge the Elixir—
The Five Phases inverted in their turn,
Three years seal the Elixir’s sacred core.

Breathing unites with the Divine,
Yin-Yang move in joyous accord—
The Elixir’s work is complete,
Lightly ascending to the cloudy heights.

Yin-Yang invert in their course,
Sun and Moon forge the Elixir’s perfection—
The Dragon meets the Flower-Pool (*huā chí*) and dies,
The Tiger encounters the Spirit-Water (*shén shuǐ*) and lives.

East and West merge with the True Dao,
South and North cycle the Flower’s brilliance—
The Five Colors (*wǔ cǎi*) gather the True Qi (*zhēn qì*),
Soaring through space, the Crane’s carriage awaits.

Who discerns the Five Phases within?
The True Qi (*xiān qì*) flows south—
Year after year, the Golden Tiger receives,
Season by season, the Wooden Dragon grows greedy—

The Flower’s Heart (*huā xīn*) turns in bitter labor,
Refined into the Elixir’s sweet fragrance—
Above, the Mysterious Light (*xiān shàng guāng*) shines,
The Elixir complete, its power now serene.

Sun and Moon each cast their light,
The Vital Essence (*jīng*) flows, never dying—
The Dragon transforms in Wood-Fire’s embrace,
The Tiger changes in Water-Metal’s concealment.

The Four Symbols’ cycles converge,
The Five Phases return to the Earthly realm—
The Elixir is done in thirty months,
When taken, one attains Heaven’s hall.

The *Tài Yī* (Grand Unity) Divine Palace’s dust,
Shines brighter through the clear window—
Wood’s Vitality and Metal’s nature settled,
The Yellow Old Man (*huáng lǎo*) and Purple Wanderer (*zǐ yóu*) are true.

Wood-Fire’s Dragon soars and leaps,
Water-Metal’s Tiger stands guard—
The Five Phases’ Qi harmonizes,
The Elixir’s power invites the Immortal Guest (*xiān bīn*).」

The Immortals sense the seasons’ shift—
Seize the Dragon at *jiǎ*’s earth,
Hunt the Tiger where *gēng*’s waters lift.

Refine with Dragon’s son’s method,
Achieve success through Tiger’s child’s aid—
Capture the living, slay the sacred sage,
Nine cycles offered to Heaven’s time.

Sun and Moon radiate their splendor bright,
The Celestial Path’s law never strays—
Three Yangs sink into Black Water’s depth,
Tenth month aligns with Yellow Sprout’s birth.

The Tiger lies light in Metal’s grace,
The Dragon hides in Wood’s extravagant way—
Three times nine, Yin-Yang’s turn,
True essence reaches the Purple Vehicle’s ray.

Lead must not darken—truth revealed,
Mercury’s error lies in sand and silver’s guise—
Wood’s essence, spirit pure and holy,
Metal’s bloom enters the Divine Pool’s guise.

The Tiger’s birth wrapped in *rén-gǒu*,
The Dragon’s rise beside *jiǎ-yǐ*—
Heaven and Earth’s numbers turn complete,
Purple Wanderer’s light shines on humanity.

Mother transforms through Son’s essence,
Gold binds Wood’s family’s form—
Two years restore the face’s hue,
One moment steals the sun’s red glow.

Dissolve Yin to complete the Dao,
Refine qi into spiritual mastery—
Now the *Héi Dān* (Returning Elixir) is named,
Long life pierces the azure void.

There is a thing with hidden true name,
Born to commune with Heaven-Earth’s spirit—
The Sun Palace transmits bone-qi,
The Moon’s Cavern nurtures the body’s form.

Refine the Yang-soul to purity,
Dissolve the Yin-shadow to stillness—
*Bǐng-Dīng*’s martial arts now end,
One grain transcends the Three Pure Ones.

The Great Dao’s transmission is not vain,
It splits open Heaven-Earth’s origin—
Who knows the spirit-matter’s strangeness?
Only the Sage’s words reveal its truth.

The Tiger’s form arises from Lead’s alchemy,
The Dragon’s name comes from Mercury’s roar—
Refine with Sun and Moon’s full measure,
Then serve the Garden of Highest Immortals.

What is the Elixir’s profound logic?
From Yin, forge Yang’s essence—
Now divide the South-North methods,
East-West chambers stand complete.

Dragon and Tiger breathe in concealment,
The *Fáng-Shēn*’s secret rules the hour—
Nine Returns, Seven Refinements,
The body surges, soaring without bound.

The spirit-sprout’s water holds sentiment,
Transformed to strength, its name is known—
Autumn harvests Metal’s marrow,
Spring stores Wood’s inner essence.

From *Kūn*’s path, grind the Purple,
Enter the Sage’s realm—light as Yellow—
*Wù-Jǐ* sits in the Central Palace,
Mutual support ascends to Highest Clarity.

Born from Heaven-Earth’s Lead—
Yin-Yang birth the Dragon and Tiger,
Gold and Wood forge the Elixir Field.

Advance and retreat the Three Blooms in secret,
Adjust and balance the Two Qi’s rotation—
From Non-Being, cultivate the Having,

Black Mercury begets White Mercury,

The Southern soul endures in the North,

Sun and Moon’s Yin-Yang respond,

Only *Kūn*’s dew bears its true name—
Three methods reveal the True Path,
Five colors shine with clarity refined.

Merge and turn through cyclic numbers,
The body becomes holy, free from mortal ties.

Lead and Mercury’s names spread far,
Born from True Water and Fire’s essence—
Yellow Light produces White Mercury,
White Mercury transforms to Yellow Light.

Two substances merge as one body,
No single person can act alone—
Nine Yangs refine through sacred labor,
Fire’s end—all Immortals welcome.

Yellow Lead returns to Black Lead,
White Mercury’s holiness reveals the Mysterious—
The Western Marsh’s male counterpart,
The Eastern Palace’s female sage.

Marry as Sun and Moon decree,
Transform the Dao to become Immortal Sage—
Nine refinements—Elixir’s light appears,
Long life forgets the passage of years.

Creation’s power matches Heaven’s might,
The Returning Elixir’s scrolls are complete—
Yin-Yang harmonize the Five Colors,
Lead and Mercury cycle the Three Mysteries.

Dragon and Tiger’s essences breathe,
The *Fáng-Shēn*’s constellation simmers in secret—
Do not abandon True Water and Fire,
Refine to ascend as Immortal Sage.

Five colors from one essence born,
Three Elements through nine cycles turn—
True Yin-Yang’s hues stand correct,
True Water and Fire are boiled to perfection.

True Mercury stands through Lead’s foundation,
True Dragon transforms to Tiger’s name—
Refine its light with Sun and Moon,
Three times nine—its truth is clear.

Who would not wish for eternal life?
To save the world, seek the Elixir’s art—
Lead ascends to Spirit Peak’s search,
Mercury follows the Divine Water’s quest.

Boil in water through nine summers,
Refine in fire through three autumns—
The Golden Chamber’s labor complete,
Return to Heaven—freedom attained.

One breath within the Dao’s Mysterious,
Yin-Yang arrayed in Nature’s law—
The Flower Pool communicates with Black Water,
True Mercury yearns for Yellow Lead.

The White Tiger is born in the tenth month,
The Green Dragon follows in two years—
Refine through three times nine months,
Lightly ascend to meet the Immortals.

The Great Returning Elixir of Dragon and Tiger,
To ponder is rare, to attain is rare—
Once found, it is as turning the palm,
Yet without it, guard the Empty Hall’s gate.

Yang-Mercury births Original Qi,
Yin-Sand endures through cold’s harsh years—
The Three Blooms follow seasonal cues,
Worthy to offer to the Jade Emperor’s gaze.

Water and Fire’s union is arduous,
Who knows how to forge the Elixir?
The Five Phases shift in reversal,
Three years pass without a single flaw.

Breathing communicates with the spirit’s stillness,
Yin-Yang’s operation brings joy—
The labor’s spirit-matter is complete,

Yin-Yang’s reversal in motion,
Sun and Moon cast the Elixir’s form—
The Dragon meets the Flower Pool and dies,
The Tiger encounters Divine Water and lives.

East and West unite the True Path,
South and North circulate the Blooms’ light—
The Five Colors’ true qi is gathered,
A crane’s carriage ascends to welcome.

Who recognizes the Inner Five Phases?
The Mysterious True-qi nourishes the South—
A year the Golden Tiger receives,
A changing season the Wooden Dragon craves—

The cycles turn the Flower’s bitter heart,
Refined, the medicine’s taste becomes sweet—
The Mysterious Light now shines,
The Elixir’s completion is serene beyond measure.

Sun and Moon each cast their light,
The Vital Essence flows, never dying—
The Dragon transforms in Wood-Fire’s embrace,
The Tiger changes in Water-Metal’s concealment.

The Four Symbols’ cycles converge,
The Five Phases return to the Earthly realm—
The Elixir is done in thirty months,
When taken, one attains Heaven’s hall.

The *Tài Yī* Divine Palace’s dust,
Shines brighter through the clear window—
Wood’s Vitality and Metal’s nature settled,
The Yellow Old Man and Purple Wanderer are true.

Wood-Fire’s Dragon soars and leaps,
Water-Metal’s Tiger stands guard—
The Five Phases’ Qi harmonizes,
The Elixir’s power invites the Immortal Guest.

The cold and heat qi rush in exchange,
The Immortals sense the seasons’ shift—
Seize the Dragon at *jiǎ*’s earth,
Hunt the Tiger where *gēng*’s waters lift.
